alert.note: Alert for Northern Erie; Southern Erie (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 18 at 6:12AM EST until February 18 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 4 inches. Northwest winds gusting as high as 30 mph, mainly near Lake Erie. * WHERE...In Pennsylvania, Northern Erie and Southern Erie counties. In Ohio, Ashtabula Inland and Ashtabula Lakeshore counties. * WHEN...Until 1 PM EST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions and poor visibility during the morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Temperatures will fall to near 20 degrees by sunrise.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1. The Pennsylvania Department of Transportation and Pennsylvania Turnpike Commission strongly encourage motorists to heed all travel restrictions and delay unnecessary travel. Visit www.511pa.com for the latest travel, roadway, and traffic conditions.
